review: Love it , definitely glad I decided to buy one
author: Amazon Customer

review: The Fire TV Stick is easy to install and easy to use. It brings me pretty much whatever I want to see. I really love it!
author: Amazon Customer "Mystery book lover"

review: This gadget is great! For whatever reason I was not successful getting Amazon prime to work on my smart tv in the past, but with the firestick setup was a breeze!
author: Surfbuddy

review: It works great but I have a Smart TV and this is like making your regular TV into a Smart TV
author: Deanna Miller

review: Netflix cuts out even though I gave 50 MB of Internet speed. Will not connect to wifi without the extension cord.
author: Richard Gage

review: I don't understand having to pay $99.00 a year to use stick
author: Jody Mather

review: Everything they say it does it does. NO problems.
author: BUDK "edsonkurtz"

review: Love it. Only wish there were more prime inclusions.
author: Mel

review: Set up was easy.  Netflix works really well with the Fire Stick; much better than with Chromecast.
author: JEFF R CLARK
